jobs.title: Growth Marketer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About us:

Miri is a performance marketing agency focusing on promoting mobile apps on Facebook and Snapchat. We enable businesses to grow rapidly by acquiring valuable users through digital advertising. We offer the full service range from creative design, campaign set-up, to ongoing campaign optimisation.

We’re a team of five working with some of the most exciting apps out there. We now need our capabilities to match our increasing demand, and we’re looking for a Growth Marketer to step up to the challenge.

About the role:

We will consider applicants with various levels of experience. We are looking for a Growth Marketer to work with us and the many apps we are helping grow across a variety of categories such as Gaming, Education as well as Health & Fitness. We are looking for someone to join our team with the primary role of running user acquisition on Facebook and Snapchat campaigns for our clients. The role involves working closely with our designers and internal teams of our clients to develop great and engaging ads as well as set up, analyse and optimise user acquisition campaigns. We believe that this methodology will allow our clients to grow successfully.

Therefore, if you:

  • Are good with numbers and love understanding what works and why it does;
  • Have a creative mind and like thinking about how a product could be promoted;
  • As a bonus, have also experience using Python;
  • Enjoy being flexible and willing to switch tasks regularly;
  • Have a good eye for detail and consistency;
  • Love A/B testing anything you can think of;
  • Enjoy talking and working directly with clients;
  • Would like to be exposed to the marketing strategies of some of the most interesting apps out there.

...Do get in touch!

What your responsibilities would be:

  • Working closely with designers and our clients to develop great and engaging ads;
  • Setting up, analysing and optimising user acquisition campaigns on Facebook and Snapchat;
  • Thinking creatively and pro-actively on current and new test ideas.

What we offer:

  • Competitive salary with discretionary bonus;
  • Startup benefits of flexible hours, casual working environment and opportunity to grow and take on responsibility
  • The opportunity to be a key player in successfully scaling a business in its early stages;
  • We have a strong background in performance marketing and are eager to share our knowledge.

jobs.title: Motion Designer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About us:

Miri is a performance marketing agency focusing on promoting mobile apps on Facebook and Snapchat. We enable businesses to grow rapidly by acquiring valuable users through digital advertising. We offer the full service range from creative design, campaign set-up, to ongoing campaign optimisation.

We’re a team of five working with some of the most exciting apps out there. We now need our capabilities to match our increasing demand, and we’re looking for a Digital Motion Designer to step up to the challenge.

About the role:

We know that design is key to the success of user acquisition and this is why this role is essential at Miri. We are looking for someone to join our team with the primary role of designing short animated videos for our clients, purpose-built for paid marketing. We run performance marketing campaigns for some of the most exciting mobile app companies in wide a range of categories such as gaming, education or health & fitness; primarily through ads on Facebook or Snapchat.

Therefore, if you:

  • Love motion design and are great at building snappy animations from scratch;
  • Have experience working with Adobe Premiere and After Effects;
  • And, as a bonus, have also worked with Sketch;
  • Enjoy being flexible and willing to switch tasks regularly;
  • Have a good eye for detail and consistency;
  • Are organised and used to dealing with large asset libraries;
  • Would like to be exposed to the marketing strategies of some of the most interesting apps out there; ...Do get in touch!

What your responsibilities would be:

  • Owning design execution across a portfolio of clients;
  • Creating start-to-finish animations purpose built for App Install Ads;
  • Working alongside account managers to think creatively and develop ad concepts for our; clients;
  • Thinking creatively and pro-actively on current and new ad concepts;

  • Long term building a lean and efficient creative engine.
    What we offer

  • Competitive salary with discretionary bonus;

  • Startup benefits of flexible hours, casual working environment and opportunity to grow and take on responsibility

  • The opportunity to be a key player in successfully scaling a business in its early stages;

  • We have a strong background in performance marketing and are eager to share our knowledge.
